articles.title: "Coco Gauff is a nice person, she wouldn't mean it" - Iga Swiatek shrugs off being hit by American at French Open - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Iga Swiatek did not make too much of a deal out of being hit by Coco Gauff during their quarterfinal clash at the 2023 French Open.
articles.content:
Iga Swiatek did not make too much of a deal out of being hit by Coco Gauff during their quarterfinal clash at the 2023 French Open.
The Pole booked her place in the semifinals of the clay-court Slam… [+2011 chars]

articles.content: Even if the season has changed in Formula 1, Ferraris relationship with questionable strategy did not. After a series of critical decisions on the strategy last year, the Prancing Horse didnt seem to… [+2779 chars]
